name: Rust Research MCP
description: Academic research paper search, download, and management tools powered by Rust
author: C. Thomas Brittain

tools.name: search_papers
tools.description: Search for academic papers by DOI, title, author, or keywords across multiple databases (arXiv, PubMed, bioRxiv, etc.)

tools.name: download_paper
tools.description: Download academic papers by DOI or URL with automatic file organization and categorization

tools.name: extract_metadata
tools.description: Extract detailed metadata (title, authors, abstract, citations) from PDF files

tools.name: generate_bibliography
tools.description: Generate formatted bibliographies in various citation styles (APA, MLA, Chicago, BibTeX)

tools.name: categorize_papers
tools.description: Automatically categorize papers using AI-powered analysis of abstracts and keywords

download_directory.description: Directory where downloaded papers will be saved
